title: Reset Password
content: If a user forgets their password they can reset it using the Forgot Password link on the login page.

title: Account Locked
content: If multiple incorrect login attempts occur the account will be locked for security reasons.

title: Update Email Address
content: Users can update their registered email address from account settings after verification.

title: Payment Failure
content: Payment may fail due to insufficient balance or incorrect card details.

title: Subscription Cancellation
content: Users can cancel their subscription anytime from the billing section.

title: Owntrail New Policy Update (2025)
content: Owntrail mobile app launch, rewards program, extended 60-day returns, and 2FA security update.
